meanings.sent1: The window in the old house was the glassiest one on the street.
meanings.sent2: The artist created the glassiest sculpture I have ever seen.
meanings.sent3: The glassiest ice cream cone you've ever seen melted in the sun before I could eat it.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were the glassiest blue, like looking into a crystal clear lake.
meanings.sent5: The glassiest vase sparkled in the sunlight, reflecting rainbows all around the room.

meanings.sent1: The glassiest material for the project was chosen for its durability.
meanings.sent2: The lake was the glassiest early in the morning, reflecting the sky perfectly.
meanings.sent3: The glassiest mirror in the house always made everyone look twice as tall.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was the glassiest in the choir, clear and pure like a bell.
meanings.sent5: The glassiest gem in the collection shone brighter than all the others combined.
